org.peertrust.inference.prolog.minerva
Class MinervaProlog

java.lang.Object
  org.peertrust.inference.prolog.minerva.MinervaProlog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, InferenceEngine
public class MinervaProlog
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceEngine, Configurable

This class queries a Minerva Prolog inference engine.
